Package com.peyrona.mingle.gum

Class CommBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.gum.CommBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.undertow.websockets.WebSocketConnectionCallback
    public final class CommBridge
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.undertow.websockets.WebSocketConnectionCallback
    WebSocket bridge that enables web clients to communicate with ExEn servers.

    Usage Contract:

    • One CommBridge instance per Undertow server
    • Browser opens WebSocket to ws://host/gum/bridge/{exen-hash} where exen-hash identifies the target ExEn
    • Multiple ExEn sessions can be multiplexed through a single WebSocket connection
    • Clients must not rely on wasClean flag due to browser connection sharing behavior
    • Automatic cleanup occurs when WebSocket closes or ExEn connections fail

    Architecture:

    This class acts as a bidirectional message bridge: 
     Browser WebSocket ←→ CommBridge ←→ ExEn TCP Connection
    Author:
    Francisco José Morero Peyrona
    See Also:
    Official website
